Multimedia.title: What makes a video go viral? Emergence!
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Summarizes key take-homes from lesson 2. Students will have explored The Game of Life to discover what *emergence* means.

Multimedia.title: "Swimming in the Dark" Fish Schooling App
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Our custom simulation allows students to run digital experiments about what drives the emergence of schooling behavior.

Multimedia.title: "EchoSim" Social Media Dynamics App
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Our custom sim allows students to explore how different human variables (like tolerance) affect the formation of echo chambers in social media.
